SELECT * FROM ( SELECT R.RECRUITANNOUNCE_NO, R.RECRUITANNOUNCE_STARTDATE, R.RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE,R.RECRUITANNOUNCE_TITLE,C.CORP_NAME, C.CORP_IMGURL, A.AREA_ADD1, A.AREA_ADD2 FROM RECRUITANNOUNCE R JOIN CORP C ON R.USER_NO=C.USER_NO JOIN AREALIST A ON R.AREALIST_NO = A.AREA_NO
WHERE RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE>=SYSDATE order by RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE ) WHERE ROWNUM <=12

SELECT * FROM ( select r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_NO, r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_startdate, r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_enddate,r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_title,r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_SPAY,c.CORP_NAME, c.CORP_IMGURL, a.AREA_ADD1, a.AREA_ADD2 from RECRUITANNOUNCE r right join CORP c on r.user_no=c.user_no left join AREALIST a on r.AREALIST_NO = a.AREA_NO
WHERE RECRUITANNOUNCE_startdate<=SYSDATE order by RECRUITANNOUNCE_startdate desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <=12

SELECT * FROM ( select r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_NO, r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_startdate, r.user_no,W.WORKKIND_NAME, r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_enddate,r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_title,r.RECRUITANNOUNCE_SPAY,c.CORP_NAME, c.CORP_IMGURL, a.AREA_ADD1, a.AREA_ADD2 from RECRUITANNOUNCE r right join CORP c on r.user_no=c.user_no left join AREALIST a on r.AREALIST_NO = a.AREA_NO join WORKKIND W ON W.WORKKIND_NO = r.WORKKIND_NO
WHERE RECRUITANNOUNCE_enddate>=SYSDATE AND R.WORKKIND_NO IN (SELECT U.WORKKIND_NO FROM USERS U WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}) ) WHERE ROWNUM <=12
